Package raymarching.shapes

Class Octahedron

java.lang.Object
raymarching.shapes.Shape
raymarching.shapes.Octahedron
public class Octahedron
extends Shape
A subclass of Shape defined by its width, height, and depth scaling factors.

  • Field Details

    • PARAMS

      public static final java.lang.String[] PARAMS
      The list of parameters required by Octahedron's constructor. The parameters are "width", "height", "depth".

  • Constructor Details

    • Octahedron

      public Octahedron​(double[] args, double[] dargs)
      Creates a new Octahedron from args and dargs. args must match the parameters in Octahedron.PARAMS. dargs must match the parameters in Shape.DEFAULT_PARAMS.
      Parameters:
      args - an array of doubles representing the paramaters described in Octahedron.PARAMS.
      dargs - an array of doubles representing the paramaters described in Shape.DEFAULT_PARAMS.

  • Method Details

    • getDistance

      public double getDistance​(Vector v)
      Description copied from class: Shape
      Computes the least distance from a point to the surface of the volume.
      Specified by:
      getDistance in class Shape
      Parameters:
      v - the point
      Returns:
      the least distance from v to the surface of the volume, which is a negative value if the point is inside the volume.

    • setBoundRadius

      protected double setBoundRadius()
      Description copied from class: Shape
      Computes the bound radius of the shape based on its dimensions. Called automatically as needed.
      Specified by:
      setBoundRadius in class Shape
      Returns:
      the least radius of a sphere centered on the shape that completely contains it.

    • getNormal

      public Vector getNormal​(Vector v)
      Description copied from class: Shape
      Computes the surface normal of the shape near a point. Often can be overridden in a subclass by a more efficient and more accurate method.
      Overrides:
      getNormal in class Shape
      Parameters:
      v - the point
      Returns:
      the unit vector normal to the surface near v.
